description: Details of each product line item associated with a sales order.

columns.name: SalesOrderID
columns.description: Primary key. Foreign key to SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderID.

columns.name: SalesOrderDetailID
columns.description: Primary key. One incremental unique number per product sold.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Product sold to customer. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

columns.name: UnitPrice
columns.description: Selling price of a single product.

columns.name: LineTotal
columns.description: Per product subtotal. Computed as UnitPrice * (1 - UnitPriceDiscount) * OrderQty.

columns.name: rowguid
columns.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: Date and time the record was last updated.
